Reference

All functions

add_date()

Adds column 'date' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

add_date_time()

Adds column 'date_time' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

add_time()

Adds column 'time' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

add_weekday()

Adds column 'weekday' to a dataframe containing a timestamp variable.

calc_feature()

Calculates a given function for each grouping variable.

check_time_format()

Helper function. Checks if character has correct time format 'hh:mm:ss'.

filter_daytime()

Filter function. Filters the data by daytime. The dataset can e.g. be filtered from "06:00:00" until "09:00:00". The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'time' (best added by the function add_time).

filter_weekday()

Filter function. Filters the data by weekdays. The dataset can e.g. be filtered by all days between monday and friday. The dataset needs an ordered factor variable named 'weekday'.

Project

R6 Object for Feature Extraction.

studentlife_small

studentlife_small

time_to_sec()

Helper function. Converts "hh:mm:ss" into number of seconds.
